title: Dark Star Thresh Skin Purchase Bug?
body:
Hi I just bought Dark Star Thresh recently. I know there are issues with the skin however I just want know if this is a bug. I purchased the skin but when I see the skin during champion select (in ranked), it has a padlock in it. It is also the padlock to the thresh skins I do not have. I'm just wondering if that only means Dark Star Thresh is unavailable or not? Was my skin not purchased properly?
 Can someone help me please im kinda confused haha.

replies.body: The Skin is currently disabled due to in game bugs causing everyone to experience fps lag when thresh leaves the fog of war.
This is correct. We're in the process of verifying a fix to get him back up and available both for being available in game and in the shop.
Thanks! Do you have an ETA of his re release?
Unfortunately, I do not at this time. I'd be happy to update you as soon as I know differently. Really sorry about the delay here.
I'm Guessing the fix they tried today didn't work.{{item:3070}}
